string.name: lyrics
string.br: Never waste your time, never let you go \n
Talk down, back-to-back, you’re the best I know \n
Oh yeah, you dey blow my mind \n
Blow my mind, blow my mind \n
For your love, I go change my life \n
Change my life, change my life (Yeah) \n
Ye gba, come here do your dance, make I spend ego (We go rendezvous) \n
Dutty whine, dutty whine for me nice and slow \n
So many nights I dey wait for my time \n
To get you all alone for one night \n
You do me somethin\', no lie, I go mad for your touch \n
I want to do you whatever you want \n
Girl, you just dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Your body dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Girl, you just dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Your body dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Yeah, yeah (\’Fore you go, I go) \n
Yeah, yeah (\'Fore you go, I go) \n
When I drink from your water, give me a cup \n
I\'m tryna steal your love, I\'m guilty of it \n
About who tellin\' all our business when I\'m killin it \n
Kissin and it turn into an animal (Oh) \n
Yeah yeah, girl, I fuck with a attitude \n
And I know you see the same vision \n
Nobody gon change how we livin \n
Nobody gon change how I feel about you \n
I want to do you, whatever you want \n
Girl, you just dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Your body dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Girl, you just dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Your body dey blow my, blow my mind \n
Yeah, yeah (Fore you go, I go) \n
Yeah, yeah (Fore you go, I go) \n
